'''Nera Bardatto''' is a character in {{poe2}}. She can initially be found in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), and later on within [Bardatto Estate](/bardattoEstate/).

## Background

{{Description|A woman in fine clothes clutches a ledger in both hands. She searches the faces of passers-by, settling on yours with an uncertain frown.}}

Nera is a dutiful member of the Bardatto family, which runs the bank that backs the financial operations of the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/). Her mother is the family matriarch [Ezzali Bardatto](/ezzaliBardatto/).

When you meet her, Nera is looking for her brother, [Larro Bardatto](/larroBardatto/), who is skipping company meetings. Due to his run-ins with Valera family, their rival in the VTC, Larro may be in a bit of danger.
